warnings: WARNING If symptoms persist more than a few days, contact a licensed practitioner. As with any other drug, if you are pregnant or nursing a baby, seek the advice of a health care professional before using this product. Keep this and all medications out of the reach of children. In case of accidental overdose, seek professional assistance or contact a Poison Control Center immediately.
dosage_administration: DOSAGE Adults: take 15 drops twice daily under tongue or diluted in water, unless otherwise recommended by your health professional.
